text:
@realDonaldTrump China surrounded by All countries for mishandling Covid19. Can say he is frestate On this, Doing crazy things to divert World Attention.

He creating panic in South China Sea, Sink Vietnam boat's. New law On Hongkong And Now India.

India want Aksai Chin back.

#ChinaLied
